sys_documentation.hint: Supports a limited set of simple odata filters. Filtering assets based on the objectid field with greater-than operator (Ex $filter=name gt ‘My Object’). Filtering assets based on date fields with greater-than, or less-than operator. Dates are interpreted as UTC dates (Ex $filter=modificationDate gt ‘2017’ and modificationDate lt ‘2017-05-26’). Supported formats: yyyy (2017); yyyy-MM (2017-12); yyyy-MM-dd (2017-12-25); yyyy-MM-dd’T’HH:mm (2017-12-25T18:30); yyyy-MM-dd’T’HH:mm:ss (2017-12-25T18:30:12); yyyy-MM-dd’T’HH:mm:ss.SSS (2017-12-25T18:30:12.798). Filtering based on a linked entity. Ex $filter=linkedTo eq 'incident/2eebf650-c5d7-4bf3-ad05-1f4cbced3b06’. Filtering based on a text field. Use the ‘contains’ operator. Ex $filter=specification contains 'desk’. Filtering based on a checkbox field on false and true values. Ex $filter=termsandconditions eq 'false’. Filtering based on a number field. Ex $filter=cost eq 15, $filter=cost ge 40. - - Filtering based on a dropdown field. Ex $filter=dropdown-field eq '2eebf650-c5d7-4bf3-ad05-1f4cbced3b06’.
sys_documentation.label: Filter
sys_documentation.name: var__m_sys_hub_action_input_7e5fc9acdb305850f7b4f7461d9619f9
